name: Gremlins in the Pipes!
description:
Welcome to the warehouse.  Help the troubled worker route goods to their right packages.  Watch out for gremlins!

Controls:

UI: Arrow Keys & Enter/Space on keyboard, D-pad & A or equivalent on joypad
Toggle junctions/queues: Enter/Space on keyboard, A or equivalent on joypad
Pause: P/Esc on keyboard, Start or equivalent on joypad

  • Control the flow of goods through the pipes and ensure that boxes are filled only with their marked types. 
  • Anything sent to the wrong box will be bounced by the special filtering cardboard and will be lost.  
  • Send any surplus goods to the unmarked storage box.
  • Put any trash or gremlins in the garbage can.
  • Any goods or trash sent to the wrong place will net you a penalty.
  • Any gremlins that make their way to a box in progress will fling out up to 3 already packed goods, losing them, costing you a time pentalty for each, and needing you to repack them.  PUT THEM IN THE TRASH.  Or send them to storage - they can't do anything there.
  • Completing all boxes successfully clears the level.
  • Try to beat the target times on all levels!

Made using Godot Engine 3
Game programming, graphics, music, sfx by bidoof boy
Bitty font by MashArcade
